headline.main: 5,000 PAINTERS GIVE PAY FOR DEFENSE; Waive Union Rules to Assist Service Groups as Part of Defend America Day

lead_paragraph: As the climax of a Defend Amer- ica Day on which thousands of New York painters gave approximately $50,000 to national defense by contributing their day's wages, 5,000 persons thronged Manhattan Center last night for a rally at which Mayor La Guardia, the principal speaker, was cheered wildly when he promised that President Roosevelt never will "sit down at a table with an international scab."

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: PAINTERS, DECORATORS AND PAPERHANGERS OF AMER, BROTHERHOOD OF
